query:
DELETE FROM mailbox 
                WHERE message_id = (                                                                                                                       SELECT message_id                                                                                                  â•‘
                    FROM mailbox                                                                                                       
                    WHERE type = $1 AND mailbox_id = $2 AND workspace_id = $3                                                          
                    LIMIT 1                                                                                                            
                )                                                                                                                      
                RETURNING payload, created_at, message_id as id;
